title: An ASCII Egg That Kills You For No Reason
content:

}

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block

|caption=YOU BETTER FIND THIS CROM!!!
|width=100%

[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--

= [[[tstaffor-s-author-page|Author Page]]] | [[[the-scip-squad-podcast-hub|Podcast]]] | [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/random:random-page|Feeling Lucky?]]]

**Tstaffor's Best of:**
* [[[SCP-6557]]] - Annihilation From a Cross Across Time
* [[[SCP-5846]]] - The One-Stop Shop
* [[[SCP-6547]]] - Worlds Within Worlds Within Worlds...
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[div class="expoblock"]]
[[=image scp-egg.png width="1000px" ]]
----
[[[SCP-4162]]] is a perfectly done "thing what kills you!" I read it and immediately fell in love with it. I've narrated it to friends multiple times over. Go read it!
[[/div]]
